title: How to do Blazor OpenID Connect authentication workflow in WebAssembly
body:
In my Blazor .net 5 web assembly application which is using an external Identity Provider, I am trying to call an API after successful login. Is there any way I can hook in the OpenID Connect authentication workflow in Blazor WebAssembly like this Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.OpenIdConnect nuget which has server-side example https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/aspnet/core/blazor/security/server/additional-scenarios?view=aspnetcore-5.0

I would appreciate it if anyone can point me in the right direction.

Thanks
